meanings.definition: Microfungi: Small fungi that are microscopic in size.
meanings.sent1: Under the microscope, the microfungi looked like tiny dots.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study microfungi to understand their impact on the environment.
meanings.sent3: The microfungi threw a tiny party in the petri dish.
meanings.sent4: In the world of nature, microfungi are like hidden treasures waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: The microfungi spread quietly, like whispers in the forest.

meanings.definition: Microfungi: Fungi that are very small and can only be seen under a microscope.
meanings.sent1: The microfungi in the soil play a crucial role in decomposition.
meanings.sent2: Researchers use special tools to observe microfungi in their natural habitat.
meanings.sent3: The microfungi had a secret meeting under the lens of the microscope.
meanings.sent4: In the world of tiny organisms, microfungi are like the stars in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The microfungi danced under the lens, revealing their intricate beauty.
